title: Book store sales in the U.S. 1992 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Sales in billion U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 27.
In general Sales in billion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
The highest Sales in billion U.S. dollars, of value 17.17 was reached at Year 2007
Minimum Sales in billion U.S. dollars about 8.33 was reached at Year 1992
